title: Volunteering for Long Beach Turkey Trot
desc: Thanks in advance for helping with the Long Beach Turkey Trot.  All shifts are at 1 Granada Ave. unless otherwise noted.? Please bring 2 canned goods or peanut butter in exchange for a FREE beachfront parking space or street parking is free.? We're asking everyone to bring canned goods on Wed. and again on Thurs. if they want free parking. ?Peanut butter is a highly-requested item at the food bank. Please bring some snacks/cold drinks to share.? Please encourage runners and walkers to register at? .?We also have on-site registration with cash-only on Wed. for packet pickup from 3:30-6:30 p.m. and again on race morning.
